lead_paragraph: Catherine Ndereba, who holds the second-fastest marathon time for a female runner behind Deena Kastor, will make her third appearance in the ING New York City Marathon on Nov. 5, race officials said yesterday.
snippet: Catherine Ndereba, who holds the second-fastest marathon time for a female runner behind Deena Kastor, will make her third appearance in the ING New York City Marathon on Nov. 5, race officials said yesterday.
